      • createRhnSet

        public static RhnSet createRhnSet(java.lang.Long userid,
                  java.lang.String label,
                  SetCleanup cleanup)
        Returns a new RhnSet.
        Parameters:
        userid - userid associated with this set.
        label - set label.
        cleanup - the cleanup that should be run when the set is stored
        Returns:
        a newly created RhnSet with the given userid and label, with an empty elements list.

      • save

        Persists the given RhnSet to the database.
        Parameters:
        set - RhnSet to be persisted.

      • cleanup

        public static void cleanup(RhnSet set)
        Cleanup the set. That is useful, when some of the items included in the set were removed from database. That might have invalidated part of the set.
        Parameters:
        set - RhnSet to cleanup.

        Parameters:

        label - The set's label.
